txt.en:
'This is a disgrace to all dwarves. How this happened, I do not know, but we will quickly act to reverse the course. A party of Orcs behind one of Khazad-dûm's great hidden doors...I cannot believe it!

'This door is an important one, as well, for behind it lies access to one of the crystal veins that run through Khazad-dûm. They are difficult to find, and thus valuable, for the crystals within give off a natural glow. They are important for exploring the depths.

'Head north-east to Kheled-menem, venture inside, and defeat Ghâshug, the Ghâsh-hai who has claimed the crystal-mine for himself. You may want to bring friends...if he managed to get behind the door, he is obviously powerful.'
'So, Ghâshug has fallen. This is good news. We should soon be able to move some miners into Kheled-menem and begin gathering the crystals ourselves.\n\n'Thank you for your help.'
'I know they may seem like useless little baubles, but I promise you that those crystals are very important.'
The crystal-mines at Kheled-menem have been taken over by a group of Ghâsh-hai led by Ghâshug.

Ghâshug is at the crystal-mines in Kheled-menem, north-east of Anazârmekhem.\n\nEndrith asked you to head to the crystal-mines of Kheled-menem and liberate them from the control of Ghâshug. He recommended you bring friends.
Endrith is at Anazârmekhem, south-west of Kheled-menem.\n\nEndrith will be pleased to hear Ghâshug has been defeated.
